mapper.select: select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id AND o.status =2

select * from (select * from cs_task t,cs_order_asset oa where oa.id = t.order_asset_id and oa.orderId=#{orderId} and t.status = 3 group by t.group_flag order by t.execute_time desc limit 0,7) a order by a.execute_time
select * from cs_alarm a where a.taskId = #{taskId} and a.level = #{level}

SELECT a.url,a.score, oa.scan_type AS scan_type,a.name,a.alarm_time FROM cs_alarm a ,cs_order_asset oa,cs_task t WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id AND t.taskId=a.taskId
and a.url=#{url}
and to_days(a.alarm_time) = to_days(now())
and to_days(now()) - to_days(a.alarm_time) <= 1
GROUP BY a.url ORDER BY a.alarm_time

SELECT a.alarm_time,COUNT(a.alarm_time) AS count FROM cs_alarm a ,cs_order_asset oa,cs_task t WHERE a.url=#{url} AND oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id AND t.taskId=a.taskId GROUP BY a.alarm_time ORDER BY a.alarm_time
select a.* from cs_alarmhuawei a,cs_taskhuawei t where t.zone_id = a.taskid and t.taskId = #{taskId}
select a.* from cs_alarmhuawei a,cs_taskhuawei t where t.zone_id = a.taskid and t.taskId = #{taskId} order by a.end_time desc limit 1
SELECT a.* FROM cs_order_asset oa ,cs_task t,cs_alarm a WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id AND t.taskId=a.taskId
SELECT a.keyword FROM cs_order_asset oa,cs_task t, cs_alarm a WHERE oa.orderId=#{orderId} AND a.url=#{url} AND oa.id=t.order_asset_Id AND t.taskId=a.taskId
